pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is twoftpd, a new FTP server that strives to be secure, simple, and efficient. None of the commands can cause execution of other programs, and the normal model of execution does a chroot to the logged in user's directory immediately after authentication.

use.flag: Break RFC compliance to allow control symbols in filenames (required for some (e.g. cp1251) encodings, use with caution).
